column2: Project Role : Application Designer Project Role Description : Assist in defining requirements and designing applications to meet business process and application requirements.  Must have skills : Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) UI Development Good to have skills : NA Minimum  3  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 full years of education Summary :As an Application Designer, you will be responsible for assisting in defining requirements and designing applications to meet business process and application requirements. Your typical day will involve working with Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) UI Development and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver impactful solutions.  Roles & Responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define requirements and design applications to meet business process and application requirements. Develop and maintain Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) UI components and templates using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability. Collaborate with back-end developers to integrate UI components with server-side logic and third-party APIs. Stay updated with the latest advancements in AEM UI Development and integrate innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) UI Development. Good To Have Skills:Experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Strong understanding of UI/UX design principles and best practices. Experience with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility. Experience with version control systems such as Git. Solid grasp of Agile development methodologies. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) UI Development. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification 15 full years of education
column11: ui development, aem, adobe experience management, agile development methodology, ui, css, python, project management, ux, software development, application design, maven, hibernate, javascript, sql server, angular, git, java, j2ee, html, agile, ui/ux, jira

column1: Digital Marketing & Content Platform Senior Architect
column2: Role & responsibilities     Work with a multi-disciplinary team to translate the clients business requirements into a solution vision and high-level architecture  Lead detailed design, implementation and integrations as part of large complex agile projects or product engineering teams  Lead globally distributed teams of AEM, integration and QA engineers to implement the solution with a combination of architectural leadership and hands-on implementation  Use your deep understanding of Digital Experience Platforms to provide thought leadership to our clients and internal teams on best leveraging the Adobe suite products  A deep knowledge of modern web frameworks and web architecture best practices and patterns  Be accountable for the overall quality and performance of the solution  Anticipate issues and risks at the module level and work with program leadership to escalate and help problem-solve appropriately  Strong experience with build script and CI CD and GIT, Jenkins or similar Preferred candidate profile     10+ years of experience in Content Management Systems in general, with at least 6 yrs of specific AEM experience required. AEM 6.3+ experience is ideal.  Bachelors degree in Computer Science (or related field) and a minimum of 8 years of overall software development experience.  Strong working knowledge of AEM/Adobe CQ/Digital Marketing Suite  Experience designing modules and components  Experience in end to end implementations of AEM  Expertise in AEM and associated technologies like Sling, OSGI, Felix, Jackrabbit, JCR, CRX.  Experience leading large sized teams and technology engagements, including client and consulting staff  Experience conceptualizing, designing, building, and deploying Enterprise Content Management solutions  Relevant working experience including expertise in Enterprise Architecture consulting skills such as interviewing stakeholders, conducting architecture reviews, and consensus building.  Professional and consultative mindset with commitment for excellent customer service.  Excellent interpersonal and communication skills (both written and oral).  Ability to come up with creative solutions for ambiguous problems and learn quickly.  Project management skills/experience.  Prior consulting / contracting experience. Perks and benefits   Best in the industry
column11: Digital Marketing, Jenkins, Enterprise Architecture, Osgi, Content Management, Adobe Cq, Aem, Ci/Cd, Jackrabbit, Adobe Suite

column2: We're Nagarro,   We are a Digital Product Engineering company that is scaling in a big way! We build products, services, and experiences that inspire, excite, and delight. We work at scale across all devices and digital mediums, and our people exist everywhere in the world (18000+ experts across 36 countries, to be exact). Our work culture is dynamic and non-hierarchical. We are looking for great new colleagues. That's where you come in! REQUIREMENTS: All of these: Client workshop management, Expert Review, Contextual enquires, Field research, Card sorting, Primary User Research, Persona Creation, User Flows, Journey Mapping, Information Architecture , Value proposition, Low to High fidelity wireframing, High Fidelity Prototyping, Design Systems All of these: Competitor Analysis, Accessibility, Story Boarding, UX Patterns, Usability Testing, Research Analysis & Synthesis Four or more of these: Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma, Adobe Illustrator, Axure, Invision, Miro All of these: Task delivery, Task status reporting, Proactive contribution, Process adherence, Autonomous task delivery, Effort estimation RESPONSIBILITIES: Assessing an existing site/property for usefulness, usability, visual design, content, and branding independently Rating and ranking sites and identifying strategic opportunities for competitive advantage based on findings. Articulating objectives to guide the development of evaluation criteria Developing evaluation criteria based on industry standards and best practices, modifying these to fit the specific objectives and needs of the project. Defining overarching navigational, organizational, and labelling structures at the suite or system level that reflects a user-cantered understanding of how different individuals and roles will consume content and complete key tasks Guiding the design of the application, tool, task, and section-level IA workstreams to harmonize with the overarching system Leading sketching and ideation sessions with colleagues and clients by drawing on the fly when walking teams through business and user requirements, including fleshing out IA, labeling, interactions, etc. Creating prototypes using tools such as InDesign, Adobe XD as required Executing and managing creative aspects of sales pursuits, including shaping, and responding to opportunities, proposal creation, and oral presentations
column11: Contextual enquiry, Design workshop, Card Sorting, Contextual enquiries, User interviews, User Experience Design, UX, Persona, Field research, User Research, Interaction Design, Value proposition, Information Architecture, Survey, Prototyping, Usability, User Centered Design

column2: Tao Digital India Private Limited is looking for Sr UI/UX_Smooth Commerce to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey        UI/UX Design: Lead the end-to-end UI/UX design process, from concept to execution, for web and mobile applications, ensuring a seamless and intuitive user experience.      User Research: Conduct user research and usability testing to gain insights into user needs, behaviors, and preferences, and incorporate findings into design decisions.      Wireframing and Prototyping: Create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes to visualize and communicate design concepts and interactions effectively.      Visual Design: Develop visually appealing designs that align with brand guidelines and elevate the overall aesthetic of our products, including color schemes, typography, and iconography.      Interaction Design: Design and implement interactive elements and animations that enhance user engagement and improve usability.      Responsive Design: Ensure designs are responsive and adaptable across various devices and screen sizes, providing a consistent and optimized experience for all users.      Collaboration: Collaborate closely with product managers, engineers, and other stakeholders to define requirements, prioritize features, and iterate on designs based on feedback and user testing.      Design System: Contribute to the development and maintenance of a design system or pattern library to promote consistency and scalability across products and platforms.      Accessibility: Ensure designs meet accessibility standards and guidelines, making our products inclusive and accessible to users with disabilities.      Documentation: Create and maintain design documentation, including design specifications, style guides, and design rationale, to support development and ensure design integrity.
column11: Design, UI/UX, Designer, Interaction, User Interface, Smooth, User Experience, E-commerce, Commerce
